name: CFD Utilities
short_description: A set of utilities for CFD. Includes grid generators for basic geometries such as the NACA series airfoils, and solvers for methods such as SIMPLE and MacCormack using FDM or FVM. Also includes some code of academic interest (Matrix/PDE solvers).
